long_description: Get a bigger-than-life look at the outdoors with the powerful, waterproof Nikon ProStaff 5 10 x 42 binoculars. With multicoated lenses and a durable build, they offer bright imagery wherever you roam. Fogproof, waterproof, shockproof binoculars feature multicoated lenses for maximum brightness, contrast and true color rendition. Body is rubber coated for a nonslip grip, whether wet or dry. Turn-and-slide rubber eyecups are compatible for use with eyeglasses. Central focusing dial provides fast, smooth and precise focusing at all distances. The Nikon ProStaff 5 10 x 42 binoculars come with a neck strap and carrying case.
short_description: Get a bigger-than-life look at the outdoors with the powerful, waterproof Nikon ProStaff 5 10 x 42 binoculars. With multicoated lenses and a durable build, they offer bright imagery wherever you roam.
